sentences.sContent: Waiters glide between tightly packed tables bearing trays of pasta.
sentences.sCn: 侍者们托着一盘盘的意大利面食在拥挤的餐桌间自如穿行。

synos.tran: 滑翔；滑行；悄悄地走；消逝

words.tran: [航] 滑翔机；滑翔员；滑翔导弹

trans.tranCn: 滑翔；滑行；悄悄地走；消逝
trans.tranOther: to move smoothly and quietly, as if without effort
a smooth quiet movement that seems to take no effort
